Reviews.Author: beth monk
Reviews.Content: This was such a waste of money, was like trying to search the web on a large android phone, wasnt very user friendly or very fast.
Reviews.Title: don't buy it.

Reviews.Author: ricky
Reviews.Content: the female part of the plug broke , it was slow, and it froze a lot and in all not happy
Reviews.Title: the female part of the plug broke

Reviews.Author: familyinbham
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet. One negative I must mention, the power adapter is cheap and broke. It left a prong inside my socket and I had to contact the power company to have them remove the prong.
Reviews.Title: Nice tablet

Reviews.Author: Jane N
Reviews.Content: Pros- very nice high resolution (1024x600) display- responsive touch screen- microSD card slot- responsive to web browsing and games- has manual buttons for volume on the side, and 4 hardware buttons in front- USB connector for keyboard/mouse (though Android 2 doesn't show the mouse cursor like Android 4 does)- really long battery life--says 10 hours, have used it for 5 and it still seems half fullCons- fairly heavy--a bit heavier than a kindle Fire, haven't weighed it exactly- old version of Android (v2), so a lot of newer apps won't run- seems to not be able to connect to a password protected wifi, but connects to wifi's without passwords
Reviews.Title: Five stars for the price

Reviews.Author: Melinda
Reviews.Content: It took forever for it to charge, and then when it did, it only lasted less than it takes me to undress. DISAPPOINTED!
Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet but it can't hold any carge

Reviews.Author: Pochocla "Suicide Pochoclo"
Reviews.Content: This ws a very dissapointing purchase. It is slow, the battery runs out too fast, it is not so intuitive as it could be, and it just sucks. I really recommend to expend a little bit more and get a good one. I bought this for my 3 year old and I don't even want him to use it because it's a shame really... I am sad and frustrated!
Reviews.Title: This tablet sucks. Big time.

Reviews.Author: Rackley Thomas
Reviews.Content: Need more memory and the touch screen is a bit stiff.maybe in the future it can be a bit faster if there are built with 1gb memory
Reviews.Title: memory/slow moving

Reviews.Author: Viper
Reviews.Content: batter life is like 15 to 20, min. ugh not long could be longer or it could be a good 1 love the tab.
Reviews.Title: not 4 mee

Reviews.Author: Richard Stange
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my Grandkids and they couldn't use it. I tried it myself and I couldn't get it to respond the way I wanted.
Reviews.Title: I sent it back

Reviews.Author: JOSE
Reviews.Content: Good morning.Buy this tablet just over two months ago but I am in Venezuela and it saddens me came two weeks ago. Unfortunately the touch screen broke. I wonder if you know where I can buy a replacement screen because here in Venezuela I get about the same price of a Tablet. Thank you.
Reviews.Title: GOOD TABLEt

Reviews.Author: Stormie ward
Reviews.Content: Its not calibrated right freezes and wont conect to the game store wont ever buy another one. Would recommend paying more money for a better one
Reviews.Title: no good

Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: Okay this tablet was bought as a Christmas present for my daughter. It's now March 19th-and I'm about ready to throw the damn thing in the trash!!!I don't appreciate having to spend HOURS charging this just for a few minutes of playtime....my daughter easily got frustrated with it and no longer plays it.For the last 2 weeks it's been in the original box packed away.It won't charge anymore-it won't even turn on. The screen flashes off and on and that's it.Very disappointing because when she could use it-my daughter loved playing on it.
Reviews.Title: Not really worth it.

Reviews.Author: SIDNEY
Reviews.Content: its not much considering the price but the worst thing is you cant use it unless its connected to a power outlet. a tablet should be able to go a few hours at least without it needing to be charged!
Reviews.Title: it sucks

Reviews.Author: aquarian
Reviews.Content: Could not get past opening screen.  Pamphlet was a photocopy of original and symbols were impossible to make out.  Text written in broken English so no help.  Returned item and replaced with much better product.
Reviews.Title: poor quality

Reviews.Author: jessyca tucker
Reviews.Content: This would not let me open aps. I guess I get what I pay for. I had to return it and buy different one.
Reviews.Title: Poor quality

Reviews.Author: D. Black
Reviews.Content: This tablets battery will not hold a charge. It can take as long as 24 hours to get a full charge and then only last 15 minutes.
Reviews.Title: Poor Battery

Reviews.Author: D. Black
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these tablets and everyone of them has a battery life of 15 minutes. I was very embarrassed giving gifts this poorly made.
Reviews.Title: Not impressed

Reviews.Author: Terri Williams
Reviews.Content: Tablet won't charge.  Then when it finally does, it loses it very quickly.  I guess I paid for what I got.
Reviews.Title: Just trying to save a little money

Reviews.Author: Dorothy Wilson
Reviews.Content: It's very slow and it doesn't like to stay on what you are looking at. I would not recommend purchasing it
Reviews.Title: jelly bean
